aboutDescription: I’m a Computer Science graduate from the Democritus University of Thrace, Greece. Since the beginning of my academic journey, I've experimented with various frameworks like Django, Flutter and React. Currently, I work as a Mobile Developer at Deloitte, specializing in Flutter and contributing to large-scale projects alongside talented teams in a highly organized environment. My goal is to improve further and deliver high-quality, user-friendly experiences.

project_1.name: SnapRFID Inventory
project_1.description: An automated object recognition system integrating RFID and AI for assisted inventory management. The system is designed to help businesses track their inventory in real-time, reducing human error and increasing efficiency.

project_2.name: Flutter News
project_2.description: Flutter News is a news app that uses NewsAPI to fetch the latest news from various sources, it also connects to firebase to authenticate users and save their favorite articles.

project_3.name: GlobalHelp App
project_3.description: GlobalHelp is a Flutter app that provides quick access to emergency numbers worldwide and allows users to easily share their location during emergencies.

project_4.name: Bookings App
project_4.description: The Bookings App is a user-friendly Java Desktop application designed to help the hotel staff with the management of reservations, check-ins, check-outs, and room availability.
